Christ's followers have been redeemed for service. Our Lord teaches that the true object of life is ministry. Christ Himself was a worker, and to all His followers He gives the law of service,--service to God and to their fellow men. . . . The law of service becomes the connecting link which binds us to God and to our fellow men.--Christ's Object Lessons, p. 326.
